input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is a portable device that can be used for air conditioning or heating. QOOLA has an adjustable temperature ranging from 15C to 45C which makes it suitable to use at any time. QOOLA has negative air ions that can remove contaminating particles and create fresh air.

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: college students
sentences: QOOLA is the perfect device to use in any situation! Whether you need to cool down or heat up, QOOLA has you covered! With an adjustable temperature range from 15C to 45C, QOOLA is perfect for any climate!

Looking for a way to keep cool during those hot summer days? Look no further than QOOLA! This portable device can be used for air conditioning or heating, and has an adjustable temperature range so it can be used at any time.

Looking for a way to keep yourself comfortable during those hot and stuffy summer days? Look no further than QOOLA! This portable device can be used for air conditioning or heating, and has an adjustable temperature that makes it perfect for any situation.
